EmailTemplate.description: Email templete to notify end user about Email change
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_User_Email_Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online User Email Changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your email address was updated from {!Contact.IAM_Previous_User_Email__c} to {!Contact.Email} by {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} on {!Contact.LastModifiedDate}. Please reach out to your location admin if this update is unauthorized. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
